posts.post_content:
Hi friends, 

I am attempting a Lavender back run. Raw and clean are the only real requirements, but if I am to be picky:

No writing, stamps, missing pieces, or any other major flaws. Pinholes and minor paper loss are OK but not preferred. Graded is fine, but I am cracking them. 

Scans or pics are a must. 

Here is what is left:

American Beauty 350
Carolina Brights
Cycle 350
Drum 350
Tolstoi

I realize these are not cheap nor easy, but I am looking, ready, willing, and able!

J.R.

Hey friends. It's been a while, but I figure I would see if any others are out there. I know there is a Cycle back in the latest REA, but it's far too high end for me. Anything lower end of Jimmy Lavender?
